SKT_FIRST.name: Split Boulders
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。\nこのスキルは自分の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>이 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>的几率使自身<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。\n自身<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>越高,则该技能的伤害越高。

SKT_SECOND.name: Break Surface
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、対象に<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>スタン</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。\nこのスキルは自分の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 대상을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>스턴</color> 상태로 만듭니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>이 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>的几率使目标陷入<color=#28d9ed>晕眩</color>状态,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。\n自身<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>越高,则该技能的伤害越高。

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Increases the chance to inflict Stunned by 15%

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Terminate Protection
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nIncreases damage dealt proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。\nこのスキルは自分の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>이 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的几率使目标<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。\n自身<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>越高,则该技能的伤害越高。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase Defense for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で防御力が<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPする。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:自分の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 방어력이 증가합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>이 높을수록 피해량이 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率使防御力提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:自身<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>越高,则伤害量越高。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
